title: Karthi tenth year anniversary of Paruthi Veeran thank you letter to fans - Tamil Movie News
text: Suriya's continuous action in favour of Jallikattu protest Few actors taste success in their debut itself and the only one who did it in the 50s was The Sivaji Ganesan and decades later on 23.2.2007, Karthi made his dream debut in ‘Paruthi Veeran’. The versatile star actor has come a long way in these ten years and here is his emotional thank you letter to his fans and all those who accompanied him in his eventful journey.
